Uses of Interface
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.Ecolaw

Packages that use Ecolaw
it.apice.sapere.api This package contains it.apice.sapere.api entities tests. 
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws This package contains the definition of SAPERE Ecolaws and relatives. 
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.compilers This package contains entities capable of converting an Eco-law to SPAR(Q|U)L queries. 
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.impl This package contains the implementation of the SAPERE API (ecolaws.impl). 
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.visitor This package contains the definition of an Ecolaw visitor. 
it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.visitors.impl This package contains the implementation of the SAPERE API (ecolaws.visitors.impl). 
it.apice.sapere.api.impl This package contains the implementation of the SAPERE API. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.core This package contains LSA-space internals interfaces. 
it.apice.sapere.api.space.core.impl This package contains LSA-space internals interfaces implementation. 
it.apice.sapere.management This package contains all the entities dedicated to eco-laws scheduling. 
it.apice.sapere.management.impl This package contains all the implementations dedicated to eco-laws scheduling.
